name: Save new Nozbe Teams tasks to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new task is created in Nozbe Teams, Make will automatically add that task to a new row in a Google Sheet spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/15uk8bliiwSLYllviSgkOcdsXGAyfSh3a_JORrBULblU/edit?usp=sharing).
